version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: added justification preference (-1 (default) = left; 1 = right, 0 = centered)

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: fixed up some edge cases and consolidate code a bit

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: add razor support (cursor in razor uses the razor area for the crossfade generation) add time selection support (cursor in time selection uses the time selection area for the crossfade generation) razor/timesel support can be optionally disabled in the Config script (on by default)

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: add razor support (cursor in razor uses the razor area for the crossfade generation) add time selection support (cursor in time selection uses the time selection area for the crossfade generation) razor/timesel support can be optionally disabled in the Config script (on by default)

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: fix default global value (was doubled) add ImGui implementation of config script

version.changelog: add support for various MIDI editors

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: bug fixes, improve item extension (and extend to grid) some refactoring

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - add new scripts for thinning all and all visible CCs in the item - add script for thinning lane under the mouse (requires SWS) - (main) context selected items script will respect Razor Edit areas

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - add new scripts for thinning all and all visible CCs in the item - add script for thinning lane under the mouse (requires SWS) - (main) context selected items script will respect Razor Edit areas

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - support separate reduction for pitch bend events (default: 10x more) - special handling for snapped pitch lanes (reduce reduction to preserve snapping as possible)

reapack.name: sockmonkey72_MouseMapFactory.lua
reapack.desc: MoM Toggle: Mouse Mod Toggle Action Generator

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - initial non-beta release (no changes from last beta)

version.name: 2.0.0-beta.1
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - support for Main, MIDI and Main+MIDI (legacy) contexts - lots of other work, support for v7 MM contexts and more

version.name: 2.0.0-beta.2
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - support for Main, MIDI and Main+MIDI (legacy) contexts - lots of other work, support for v7 MM contexts and more - beta.2: fix crash when minimizing/expanding window (unattached Image)

version.name: 2.0.0-beta.3
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - support for Main, MIDI and Main+MIDI (legacy) contexts - lots of other work, support for v7 MM contexts and more - beta.2: fix crash when minimizing/expanding window (unattached Image) - beta.3: - add some tooltip explanations of what 'section' means for various actions - some cleanup of action generation code and Actions submenu of Gear

version.name: 2.0.0-beta.4
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: - support for Main, MIDI and Main+MIDI (legacy) contexts - lots of other work, support for v7 MM contexts and more - beta.2: fix crash when minimizing/expanding window (unattached Image) - beta.3: - add some tooltip explanations of what 'section' means for various actions - some cleanup of action generation code and Actions submenu of Gear - beta.4: fix toggle action restore state for different section contexts

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: simplify to a single Toggle Command script

reapack.desc: Selected Envelope Points to Razor Edit

version.name: 1.7.4-beta.5
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: * swap position of rec monitor mode and rec input mode in MCP * add v7 fixed lane graphics * minor color tweaks

version.name: 1.7.4-beta.6
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: * add theme adjuster option to align TCP controls

version.name: 1.7.4-beta.7
version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog: * improve MIDI editor colors (wrt marker visibility) * update TCP fixed lane graphics for v7 * fix transport artifact on Windows * fix some warnings

version.author: sockmonkey72
version.changelog:
Changes since 1.7.3:
* add and improve graphics for 'norec' (audio monitor only) on MCP/TCP * fix media item unselected color and upper/lower borders * fix dual pan positioning in MCP label bottom layouts * fix MCP layout problems (volume/meter/trackid) * swap position of rec monitor mode and rec input mode in MCP * add v7 fixed lane graphics * minor color tweaks * add theme adjuster option to align TCP controls * improve MIDI editor colors (wrt marker visibility) * update TCP fixed lane graphics for v7 * fix transport artifact on Windows * fix some warnings * lighten selected track backgrounds for better envelope visibility * (versus previous beta: fix folder-aligned TCP control positioning in some cases)
